required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Exercise Habits: A Survey of Individuals With Parkinson's Disease Living in the Community
clinical_study.official_title: Exercise Habits: A Survey of Individuals With Parkinson's Disease Living in the Community

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate the exercise regimens of individuals with Parkinson's.

primary_outcome.measure: Self-reported age of Parkinson's Disease Diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: Average age of diagnosis with Parkinson's Disease for enrolled participants.
Number of participants reporting 1. less than 12 years of school, 2. completed high school, 3. completed bachelor degree, 4. completed graduate/advanced degree.
Number of participants reporting 1.living alone, 2. living with others 3. living in a healthcare facility

primary_outcome.measure: Self-reported number of years taking medicine for Parkinson's Disease
primary_outcome.description: Average number of years participants reported taking medication for Parkinson's Disease
Number of participants reporting they have undergone deep brain stimulation for Parkinson's Disease.
Average reported stage of Parkinson's Disease participants (1. mild with no symptoms, 2. mild with symptoms, 3. moderate, 4. advanced, able to walk 5. advanced, unable to walk).
Number of participants reporting 1. they need help from another person during the day or 2. they do not need help from another person during the day.
Number of participants reporting 1. ability to walk unaided, 2. ability to walk with an assistive device, or 3. requiring assistance to walk
Participants reported mobility level ranging from independent to total assist required.
3 question survey component evaluating the exercise habits of individuals with Parkinson's Disease using a Likert scale from 0-5 where 5 indicated a higher levels of exercise.
7 question survey evaluating the level of intensity of exercise of individuals with Parkinson's Disease using a Likert scale from 0-5 where 5 indicated higher levels of intensity.

arm_group.description: Individuals that have been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease will be enrolled to participant in the survey research.

intervention.description: Participants responded to questions about their exercise habits and perceived levels of intensity as well as demographic information.

study_pop.textblock: Individuals ages 40-90 years old who have been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease
- Able to speak English
Exclusion Criteria:
- No internet access
